title: Stolen account
body: **Please i need help..Someone stole my account i cant do anything to get in please help me **

replies.body: Your best bet for account recovery type issues is to reach out to our account specialists in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Make sure to pick "I need help recovering my account" as the ticket subject to make sure it gets to the right agents!
